original_title: Shadow Sister: a Film Biography of Australian Aboriginal Poet Kath Walker
overview: This documentary shows the well-known Aboriginal poet Oodgeroo Noonuccal (Kath Walker) living on Stradbroke Island, Queensland, the place that was once the home of her native tribe. She welcomes visitors, particularly Aboriginal children, hoping to imbue them with pride in their own culture.
title: Shadow Sister: a Film Biography of Australian Aboriginal Poet Kath Walker
